name: Giver: Virtual Playground
description:
The popular TVOKids reality show Giver now has its own augmented reality app. You can see the coolest Giver rides and playground equipment right at home!

Just download the app on to your phone or tablet, print the markers (included with the app or download from the following link: http://www.sinkingship.ca/giver2/GiverMarker.pdf ), point your device at the marker and then watch as a cool animated models of climbers, zip-lines, and playhouses shaped like dinosaurs – all with tiny little people running around on them.

Let's Giver!
